alert.note: Alert for Eastern Pondera; Toole (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 22 at 10:59PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Pondera and southwestern Toole Counties through 1130 PM MDT... At 1058 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northeast of Valier, or 11 miles southwest of Shelby, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shelby and Ethridge. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 351 and 361. Highway 2 between mile markers 267 and 274. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall may also lead to minor localized flooding, especially in low-lying areas. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
